title: Introducing: Abe
content:
Sheffield based band Abe just dropped their debut EP, the mysteriously titled Heave-Ho and the aforementioned single is the perfect introduction to their sonic universe.

 The first thing you’ll notice is Clubbs Coldron‘s deep, alluring voice in heart aching electro-pop single Wink Wink. An ’80s inspired synth-pop ballad expertly toying with modern production techniques yet gushing with all the warm emotions of a misunderstood past. Wink Wink will have you craving more; tame this hunger is by streaming/purchasing their Heave-Ho EP at their Bandcamp page.
